lead_paragraph: When Andre Drummond's shot from about 80 feet dropped straight through the net to end the third quarter, Toronto's lead was down to five points, and it looked like this game against the Detroit Pistons might come down to the wire.

headline.print_headline: Raptors Beat Pistons 103-89, Have Won 14 of 15
headline.main: Raptors Beat Pistons 103-89, Have Won 14 of 15

snippet: When Andre Drummond's shot from about 80 feet dropped straight through the net to end the third quarter, Toronto's lead was down to five points, and it looked like this game against the Detroit Pistons might come down to the wire....
